title: Group Therapy: Her Mother-In-Law Gives Awful Christmas Presents
description: A listener emailed us about how her mother-in-law is the worst gift giver to the point that it gives her anxiety the amount of junk she gives her and her husband for Christmas.  She wants to know if she should say something or just keep collecting all this junk?
